info.title: Dota Data API
info.description: API documentation for Dota Data service routes.

post.summary: Invalidate a specific cache entry by type and key

items.description: List of cache entries to invalidate

get.description: This endpoint uses an async/polling pattern. If the data is not available yet, it will queue the fetch and return a 202 response with `{ status: 'queued', signature }`. The client should poll this endpoint until a 200 response with the data is returned.

202.description: Data is being fetched; client should poll until 200 is returned.

get.description: To force a refresh and bypass the cache, add `?force=true` to the request URL. All cache invalidation and refresh is now handled via this query parameter.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force refresh - bypass cache and fetch fresh data

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force refresh - bypass cache and fetch fresh data

parameters.name: force

post.summary: Import Dotabuff matches for a team
post.description:
This endpoint uses an async/polling pattern. If the data is not available yet, it will queue the fetch and return a 202 response with `{ status: 'queued', signature }`. The client should poll this endpoint until a 200 response with the data is returned.
To force a refresh and bypass the cache, add `?force=true` to the request URL. All cache invalidation and refresh is now handled via this query parameter.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force refresh - bypass cache and fetch fresh data

202.description: Data is being fetched; client should poll until 200 is returned.
